Gerbins? I hadn't heard that term before, but I'm a librarian.
I looked it up!
|
|[]https://paizo.com/products/btq02esj/discuss?Pathfinder-Society-Scenario-503-Heidmarch-Heist#8 []https://paizo.com/people/Agraic
Hilary Moon Murphy wrote:
Gerbins? I hadn't heard that term before, but I'm a librarian.
And here th' bird 's tryin' t' be all fancy-schmancy an' stuff talkin' an' not conveyin' what they're tryin' t' say an' all.
"Gob'ins!"

|3 people marked this as a favorite.|[]https://paizo.com/people/HilaryMoonMurphy
Thanks to my amazing developer, Josh Foster, this mystery adventure turned out so well. I GMed three author tables of it at SkalCon last weekend, and it was so much fun watching my players try to figure out what was going on.
I created a folder with some extras if GMs want to look through them:
Heidmarch Heist Handouts
The most useful thing in there is a copy of the Map of Heidmarch Heist that I used when writing this adventure.
Happy sleuthing, Everyone!
Hmm
|
